"Shoulder View": "The Shoulder View is a special camera mode, mostly used with ranged weapons. Use it when you need to make precision attacks."

"For Keyboard & Mouse
\u3000\u3000Press the <%ChangeView>to switch the view mode.
\u3000\u3000Use the mouse to move the camera around.

For <#GamePad> Controls
\u3000\u3000Press <%ChangeView> to switch the view mode.
\u3000\u3000Use the <%RStick> to move the camera around."

"To go back to the normal camera, simply press <%ChangeView> again.

Remember to use this mode when you need a precise attack."
